Lyrics: Toutes les nuitz que sans vous je me couche,
Poetic Translation: All the nights that I lie down without you,

Lyrics: Pensant à vous ne fay que sommeiller,
Poetic Translation: Thinking of you, I learn for sleep's abyss

Lyrics: Et en revant jusques au resveiller
Direct Translation: See translation at Choral Public Domain Library.
Poetic Translation: To dream of you until I wake from bliss.

Lyrics: Incessemment vous quiers parmi la couche,
Poetic Translation: I search for you as though the blankets hide you;

Lyrics: Et bien souvent au lieu de vostre bouche
Poetic Translation: Without your mouth, each time I think about you,
I, sighing then, my pillow softly kiss.
